summary: This is a brief email exchange from December 1, 2018, referencing a Miami Herald article about the Jeffrey Epstein sex trafficking case. The correspondence confirms the case is 'on the docket' and inquires about being 'open' on it, suggesting internal discussion or planning regarding the case.

events.title: Email Exchange on Epstein Case
events.description: An email exchange occurs confirming the Jeffrey Epstein sex trafficking case is on the docket and inquiring about being 'open' on it, referencing a Miami Herald article.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 1, 2018, discussing the Jeffrey Epstein sex trafficking case.
The correspondence references a specific Miami Herald article (article220097825) about the case.
The email states the case is 'on the d/I' (likely 'on the docket') as of that date.
The email asks 'Are we open on this? Can we be?', suggesting operational or strategic planning regarding the case.
The document is a direct communication, indicating internal awareness and discussion of the Epstein case in late 2018.
